job.title: Software Engineer Intern
job.description: <p><strong>Roles &amp; Responsibilities: </strong></p><p>Understanding customer requirements.</p><p>Assisting with project planning, scoping, prioritization.</p><p>Providing estimates; Identifying task ownership.</p><p>Design: Creating simple, flexible, and comprehensive strategies.</p><p>Providing and soliciting design feedback.</p><p>Implementation: Writing quality code at the source.</p><p>Authoring validation tests; Providing timely issue resolutions.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications Eligibility Criteria:</strong></p><p>BS or MS degree focused in Computer Science or related quantitative field with minimum CGPA &gt; 3.0.</p><p><strong>Ability to write clean, well-crafted code emphasizing quality, simplicity, durability, and maintainability.</strong></p><p>Languages: C/C++, Python, Java, HTML, CSS, JS</p><p>Locations of Operation: Work from Home</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Perks</strong></p><p><br></p><p>Five days a week</p><p>Number of openings: 9</p>
